phase_1.name: Installation and Setup
phase_1.description: Project structure, dependencies, UV setup - no integration tests needed

phase_2.name: Database Integration
phase_2.description: ModelSEED database loading foundation - all must pass (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_3.name: Template Management and Model Storage
phase_3.description: Template loading and session storage required before model building (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_4.name: build_media Tool
phase_4.description: Growth media creation from compounds (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_5.name: build_model Tool
phase_5.description: Metabolic model building from genome data (RAST, FASTA, dict) (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_6.name: gapfill_model Tool
phase_6.description: Model gapfilling with media and failure handling (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_7.name: run_fba Tool
phase_7.description: Flux balance analysis execution (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

phase_8.name: Compound Lookup Tools
phase_8.description: Compound search and retrieval from ModelSEED database (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED - See phase_12 for actual implementation)

phase_9.name: Reaction Lookup Tools
phase_9.description: Reaction search and retrieval from ModelSEED database (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED - See phase_12 for actual implementation)

phase_10.name: Session Management Tools
phase_10.description: Session-based model and media management (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase10_session_management.py)

phase_11.name: Complete Workflow Integration
phase_11.description: End-to-end workflow testing all tools together (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase11_complete_workflow.py)

phase_12.name: Database Lookup Tools (Compounds and Reactions)
phase_12.description: Compound and reaction search/lookup from ModelSEED database (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase12_database_lookups.py)

phase_13.name: Error Handling and JSON-RPC Compliance
phase_13.description: JSON-RPC 2.0 error handling and edge case coverage (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase13_error_handling.py)

phase_14.name: Model ID State Suffix Transformations
phase_14.description: Model ID state suffix transformations during gapfilling according to spec 002-data-formats.md (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase14_model_id_transformations.py)

phase_15.name: Comprehensive Error Handling Test Suite
phase_15.description: Comprehensive error handling test suite covering all error types from spec 013-error-handling.md (IMPLEMENTED - test_phase15_comprehensive_error_handling.py)

notes: Phases 1-9 are placeholder specifications for future implementation
Phases 10-15 are currently implemented with integration tests
Phase 12 combines compound and reaction lookup tests (originally phases 8-9)
Phase 15 implements Task 88: Comprehensive error handling test suite
Performance tests in phase 12 are may_fail to avoid blocking on optimization work
All must_pass tests should pass before considering phase complete
May_fail tests are optional enhancements that can be implemented later
